short_summary: Field pea breeding contract. Breeding lines will be tested for agronomic characteristics, disease resistance, and quality traits.
description: This contract is for the Coordination of Field pea Co-op Testing Trials. Field pea breeding lines will be tested for agronomic characteristics, disease resistance, and quality traits. The Contractor shall provide the following services: - Coordination of the Pea Co-op Trials. - Collection and summarization of data from all testing sites including agronomic, disease, and quality data.
duration_in_months: You can renew the contract for up to 4 years
tags: Crop Development Centre of the University of Saskatchewan
Section 6(d) of the Government Contracts Regulations
